titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of funds made available under the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to purchase communications equipment or services that pose a national security risk.
American Telecommunications Security Act
American Telecommunications Security Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
American Telecommunications Security Act
This bill prohibits the use of certain funds to purchase communications equipment or services determined to pose a national security risk.
